item.title: [Pi] 1 error [Pi] [Modified]
item.dc:creator: @Int_Bauk Int Bauk
item.description:
@Int_Bauk wrote:

b00mz1029:

Sorry for being a pain but I’m kinda confused, I’m not a great coder so I’m not entirely sure what that means :\ I took out the duplicate case but I’m not sure about the part before that

i gave you the solution, and i’m trying to not spoonfeed as much, but here:

[code] public String itemType(int item) {
if(Item.playerCape(item)) {
return “cape”;
}
if(Item.playerBoots(item)) {
return “boots”;
}
if(Item.playerGloves(item)) {
return “gloves”;
}
if(Item.playerShield(item)) {
return “shield”;
}
if(Item.playerAmulet(item)) {
return “amulet”;
}
if(Item.playerArrows(item)) {
return “arrows”;
}
if(Item.playerRings(item)) {
return “ring”;
}
if(Item.playerHats(item)) {
return “hat”;
}
if(Item.playerLegs(item)) {
return “legs”;
}
if(Item.playerBody(item)) {
return “body”;
}
switch (item) {
case 11732: //Dragon Boots
return “boots”;

case 11728: //Bandos Boots
        return "boots";

case 11724: //Bandos Body
        return "body";
  
case 11726: //Bandos Tassets
        return "legs";

case 11718: //Armadyl Helmet
return "hat";
     
case 11720: //Armadyl Body
        return "body";
                                   
case 11722: //Armadyl Plateskirt
        return "legs";
                              

case 9748: //Skill Cape
        return "cape";

case 9751: //Skill Cape
        return "cape";

case 9754: //Skill Cape
        return "cape";

case 9757: //Skill Cape
        return "cape";

case 9760: //Skill Cape
        return "cape";

case 9763: //Skill Cape
        return "cape";

case 9766: //Skill Cape
        return "cape";

case 9769: //Skill Cape
        return "cape";

case 9772: //Skill Cape
        return "cape";

case 9775: //Skill Cape
        return "cape";

case 9778: //Skill Cape
        return "cape";

case 9781: //Skill Cape
        return "cape";

case 9784: //Skill Cape
        return "cape";

case 9787: //Skill Cape
        return "cape";

case 9790: //Skill Cape
        return "cape";

case 9793: //Skill Cape
        return "cape";

case 9796: //Skill Cape
        return "cape";

case 9799: //Skill Cape
        return "cape";

case 9802: //Skill Cape
        return "cape";

case 9805: //Skill Cape
        return "cape";

case 9808: //Skill Cape
        return "cape";

case 9811: //Skill Cape
        return "cape";

case 9813: //Skill Cape
        return "cape"; 

	}
	return "weapon";
}[/code]

also, i don’t see why your trying to put in a switch-statement rather then an array?

item.description:
@Int_Bauk wrote:

l2declare

public String itemType(int item, int itemType) { for (int i=0; i < Item.capes.length;i++) { if(item == Item.capes[i]) return "cape"; } for (int i=0; i < Item.hats.length;i++) { if(item == Item.hats[i]) return "hat"; } for (int i=0; i< Item.boots.length;i++) { if(item == Item.boots[i]) return "boots"; } for (int i=0; i< Item.gloves.length;i++) { if(item == Item.gloves[i]) return "gloves"; } for (int i=0; i< Item.shields.length;i++) { if(item == Item.shields[i]) return "shield"; } for (int i=0; i< Item.amulets.length;i++) { if(item == Item.amulets[i]) return "amulet"; } for (int i=0; i< Item.arrows.length;i++) { if(item == Item.arrows[i]) return "arrows"; } for (int i=0; i< Item.rings.length;i++) { if(item == Item.rings[i]) return "ring"; } for (int i=0; i< Item.body.length;i++) { if(item == Item.body[i]) return "body"; } for (int i=0; i< Item.legs.length;i++) { if(item == Item.legs[i]) return "legs"; } return "weapon"; switch (itemType) { case 11732: //Dragon Boots return "boots"; break; case 11728: //Bandos Boots return "boots"; break; case 11724: //Bandos Body return "body"; break; case 11726: //Bandos Tassets return "legs"; break; case 11718: //Armadyl Helmet return "hat"; break; item.title: [Pi] 1 error [Pi] [Modified]
item.dc:creator: @b00mz1029 b00mz1029
item.description:
@b00mz1029 wrote:

Hey guys I need some of my items to go into the correct weapon slot so I added some stuff to the bottom of this method, and I get this error, can anybody please help me, I don’t know how to make it recognize switch (itemType) {

public String itemType(int item) { for (int i=0; i < Item.capes.length;i++) { if(item == Item.capes[i]) return "cape"; } for (int i=0; i < Item.hats.length;i++) { if(item == Item.hats[i]) return "hat"; } for (int i=0; i< Item.boots.length;i++) { if(item == Item.boots[i]) return "boots"; } for (int i=0; i< Item.gloves.length;i++) { if(item == Item.gloves[i]) return "gloves"; } for (int i=0; i< Item.shields.length;i++) { if(item == Item.shields[i]) return "shield"; } for (int i=0; i< Item.amulets.length;i++) { if(item == Item.amulets[i]) return "amulet"; } for (int i=0; i< Item.arrows.length;i++) { if(item == Item.arrows[i]) return "arrows"; } for (int i=0; i< Item.rings.length;i++) { if(item == Item.rings[i]) return "ring"; } for (int i=0; i< Item.body.length;i++) { if(item == Item.body[i]) return "body"; } for (int i=0; i< Item.legs.length;i++) { if(item == Item.legs[i]) return "legs"; } return "weapon"; switch (itemType) { case 11732: //Dragon Boots return "boots"; break; case 11728: //Bandos Boots return "boots"; break; case 11724: //Bandos Body return "body"; break; case 11726: //Bandos Tassets return "legs"; break; case 11718: //Armadyl Helmet return "hat"; break; case 11720: //Armadyl Body return "body"; break; case 11722: //Armadyl Plateskirt return "legs"; break; case 9790: //Construction cape return "cape"; break; case 9748: //Skill Cape return "cape"; break; case 9751: //Skill Cape return "cape"; break; case 9754: //Skill Cape return "cape"; break; case 9757: //Skill Cape return "cape"; break; case 9760: //Skill Cape return "cape"; break; case 9763: //Skill Cape return "cape"; break; case 9766: //Skill Cape return "cape"; break; case 9769: //Skill Cape return "cape"; break; case 9772: //Skill Cape return "cape"; break; case 9775: //Skill Cape return "cape"; break; case 9778: //Skill Cape return "cape"; break; case 9811: //Skill Cape return "cape"; break; case 9813: //Skill Cape return "cape"; break; } }
